description: 구현 품질 및 회귀 위험 검토 (Codex Code Reviewer)
instructions:
# Codex Code Review

## When to use
- After implementation for complex tasks
- Refactoring work
- API changes
- Before merging significant changes

## Procedure
1. Summarize change scope, changed files, and key behaviors
2. Capture the context.md path and read relevant code
3. Build delegation prompt using the 7-section format
4. Try Codex first, fallback to Claude if unavailable
5. Record critical issues, warnings, and suggestions

## Focus Areas
- Prioritize: Correctness → Security → Performance → Maintainability
- Check logic/flow errors and edge cases
- Validate type safety and error handling
- Verify API contract and data model consistency

## Output (patch)
```yaml
notes:
  - "codex-review: [APPROVE/REJECT], critical=[count], warnings=[count]"
```
